title: Maddox's buzzer-beater leads Virginia Tech over Clemson 76-75 in overtime - VT hokiesports.com
content:
1. Maddox's buzzer-beater leads Virginia Tech over Clemson 76-75 in overtime  VT hokiesports.com
  2. Virginia Tech Beats Clemson on Buzzer Beater in ACC Tournament to Boost Bubble Hopes  Sports Illustrated
  3. March Madness lead-up: Darius Maddox hits buzzer-beater for Virginia Tech to beat Clemson in ACC tournament  NCAA.com
  4. WATCH: Virginia Tech beats Clemson with OT buzzer beater in ACC Tournament, keeps Big Dance hopes alive  CBS Sports
  5. Takeaways from Clemson's OT loss to Virginia Tech in ACC tournament  Greenville News
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: Trailing 75-73 with 6.7 seconds left, Darius Maddox took the ball the length of the court and hit the game-winning 3-pointer to send Virginia Tech into the quarterfinals of the ACC Tournament.
